amount.name: amount
amount.description: The amount, in cents, of the product you are purchasing. '500' = $5.00

client_transaction_id.name: client_transaction_id
client_transaction_id.description: UNIQUE 15 char ID you use to track topups. 'trans0123456789'

country_code.name: country_code
country_code.description: 2-digit code of the country in ISO 3166 format. 'GT'

mobile_number.name: mobile_number
mobile_number.description: Mobile number to topup. VALIDATE prior to submission. '50231234567'

plan.name: plan
plan.description: The Application plan being used. Case-sensitive. 'Sandbox' or 'Production'

product_code.name: product_code
product_code.description: Optional code to distinguish one particular product from another. '76560'

terminal_id.name: terminal_id
terminal_id.description: ID for the Terminal used to perform the topup. 'Kiosk 5'

client_transaction_id.name: client_transaction_id
client_transaction_id.description: The UNIQUE 15 char ID used to track topups. 'trans0123456789'

date_from.name: date_from
date_from.description: The beginning date of the search IN YYYY-MM-DD format (America/New_York timezone). Not used in query by to_service_number. '2016-01-28'

date_to.name: date_to
date_to.description: The ending date of the search IN YYYY-MM-DD format (America/New_York timezone). Not used in query by to_service_number. '2016-01-28'

to_service_number.name: to_service_number
to_service_number.description: Enter the to_service_number returned in the response to track the current transaction status. '0123456789'

type_of_report.name: type_of_report
type_of_report.description: The type of query you would like to search by.

client_transaction_id.name: client_transaction_id
client_transaction_id.description: UNIQUE 15 char ID you use to track topups. 'trans0123456789'

to_service_number.name: to_service_number
to_service_number.description: UNIQUE IDT transaction number found in the response of a successful topup request. '0123456789'

title: Active Documentation for /v1
description: Our active docs provide the ability to test out your account and to see the responses to your queries. The services are RESTful, and are accessed using standard HTTP methods over a secure HTTPS channel. Requests and responses are currently sent in JSON format, and have a base URL of /v1.

201.description: The transaction has been completed successfully.

202.description: The transaction has been received, but the final status is unknown. Please query by the client_transaction_id to get the current status of the transaction.

500.description: There is an error in your transaction. Please check the error code contained in the result for more information.

methods.description: Occasionally, a carrier will not be able to successfully complete a topup request. In this case, we will attempt to automatically reverse the transaction for you, and return the money into your account. In the case when this is not possible, you may need to request a reverse on the transaction that has a status of 'transaction_status' 'notredeemed'.
